title: GodStaff Jax isn't marked as epic in the skins tab.
body: In the skinstab it keeps track of all your epic skins (and other tiers). I noticed that Godstaff jax is marked as "other", and after looking through my collection it seems like it's really only this case.

replies.body:
Hey again! 

I'm checking this on the equivalent of PBE internally, and it looks like he's been properly labeled now. If all goes well, this should be flagged as Epic in 8.7. ^^ 
https://imgur.com/UC5OkbQ
That's great. glad i could help point this out.
Hiii! Thanks for the report! Looks like the skin's just missing a tag in its data. I'll see if we can get this fixed up!
